metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8393 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to a global buffer over-read error becauseof an assumption made by code that runs for objcopy and strip, thatSHT_REL/SHR_RELA sections are always named starting with a .rel/.relaprefix. This vulnerability causes programs that conduct an analysis ofbinary programs using the libbfd library, such as objcopy and strip, tocrash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
